- Ты сегодня неважно выглядишь. Плохо се: - You don't look very good today. Are you sick?
- Да нет, просто устал. День был тяжелый: - No not really, I'm jus tired. It was a rough day.
- Тяжелый? А мне показалось, что ты весь: - Rough& I though you spent the entire day at home.
- yeah, so? It would have been better if I had gone to work. At home it is terrible. The telephone rings the entire day. One person needs one thing, a second person another, and a third another. I just sit down at my computer and I have to get up and run to the phone again.
- А кто тебя заставляет? Можешь, в конце: - Who's making you answer the phone? You could, after all, just unplug it.
- В том-то и дело, что не могу. жду звон: - That's the thing, I can't. I'm waiting for a call.
- Ну, как тебе сказать... Одна девушка д: - Well, how should I put it? A girl is supposed to call me.
- Почему? Ты мне не доверяешь? Я, между: - Why? Don't you trust me? By the way, I am a very good friend.
- Доверяй, но проверяй. Знаю я твои спо: - 'Trust, but always check' as the saying goes. I know what you are capable of.
- Ну, ты меня явно переоцениваешь. Хотя: - You are clearly overestimating me. Although there is  a devilish side to me!
- It's hard to argue with that.
- Ну ладно, хватит обо мне. Какие ещё у: - Well all right, that's enough about me. What other problems do you have?
- Какие могут быть проблемы! Конечно, ра: - What other kinds of problems could there be! Work, of course. I can't get my thoughts together. Today, I wanted to finish my work, but i couldn't come up with anything.
- Ну да! За весь день палец о палец не у: - That's a good one. All day I didn't even lift a finger. And tomorrow I have to meet with the buyer. I don't know what's with me.
- Я думаю, ты просто влюбился. А это уже: - I think that you just fell in love. It's an illness you know. You need a doctor.
- Все, хватит иронизировать. Пошли заним: - Well, stop being ironic. Let's go work, while I have some new energy.
- You see how I inspire you!
